agents package¶

Submodules¶

agents.fixed_agent module¶

class agents.fixed_agent.FixedAgent(price: float = 0.5)¶

Bases: agent.Agent

An agent that always returns the same price.

get_initial_price() → float¶

Represents the initial price of the product set by the agent (at timestep = 0).

Returns

Price of the product set by the agent at timestep = 0, discretised within [0,1].

Return type

float

Raises

NotImplementedError – If concrete class does not override method.

get_price(last_round_agents_prices: list[float], last_round_sales: int, identity_index: int) → float¶

Calculate the agent’s price at the current timestep using data from the previous timestep.

Parameters

  • last_round_all_agents_prices (list of float) – List of all the prices set by all agents in the previous timestep.

  • last_round_sales (int) – A positive integer representing the number of sales the agent made in the previous timestep.

  • identity_index (int) – A positive integer that tells the agent which index in the list corresponds to themself.

Returns

Price of the product set by the agent at the current timestep, discretised within [0,1].

Return type

float

Raises

NotImplementedError – If concrete class does not override method.
